text: Engro Fertilizers is a Pakistani fertilizer manufacturing company and is a subsidiary of conglomerate Engro Corporation. The company has a local market share of 30 percent. The company was demerged from the parent company in 2010. ==References== == External links == Category:Engro Corporation Category:Companies based in Karachi Category:Companies listed on the Pakistan Stock Exchange Category:Chemical companies established in 2010 Category:Pakistani companies established in 2010 Category:Fertilizer companies of Pakistan
title: Engro Fertilizers
